item.title: FO - Menu and Navigation - Sort and filter - Sort the products
item.description: FO - Menu and Navigation - Sort and filter - Sort the products Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Automated on : 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-6952 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > In Popular Products, click All products The category Home is displayed The sorting by default is “Relevance” Sort products by Name, A to Z Products are sorted by name (x -> y -> z) Sort products by Name, Z to A Products are sorted by name (z -> y -> x) Sort products by Price, low to high Products are sorted by Price (1 -> 2 -> 3) Sort products by Price, high to low Products are sorted by Price (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort products by Relevance Products are sorted by ID product asc (1 -> 2 -> 3) in FO Sort products by Sales, highest to lowest No sales yet, so the products are sorted by Relevance Go to BO > Orders > Orders > Changed the Order status of the latest order (ID : 5) to “Payment accepted” Message Successful update is displayed Go back to FO > All Products > Refresh See that the first product shown is Brown bear cushion Color : Black

item.description: FO - Menu and Navigation - Sort and filter - Clear one filter Details Component : Core Status : IN REVIEW Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-6955 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO> all products All products page is displayed Filter products by Composition. Only products with Composition Ceramic, Cotton and Recycled cardboard are displayed. Active filters Composition: Ceramic, Composition: Cotton, Composition: Recycled cardboard.
